DescriptionData.Title: AJs Retro Over The Knee Tube Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Retro over the knee high tube socks are stylish and fun as well as functional. They're great for teams, dance groups, skaters, cheerleaders or any group that wants a graphic and bold look for their uniform.
These socks have stripes at the top. They are 29 inches long, and made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic. They are very stretchy, but hold their shape once pulled on.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Over the knee tube socks with three stripes at the top
29 inches in length when unstretched
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon, and 6% elastic
Fits shoe sizes 5 and up (sock sizes 11-13)
May not come up as far up on large legs

DescriptionData.Title: AJs 23" Solid Colored Leg Warmers w/ Welt
DescriptionData.Description:
These leg warmers are perfect for teams or any dance group that needs an easy uniform accessory. They are also a nice fashion statement for anyone, and will keep you warm. They are stretchy enough to cover blue jeans, but have enough elastic in them to keep them in place.
These fun leg warmers have a stylish rib at the top and at the bottom and are made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic. Sized to fit most adults (22 inches in length). Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Solid color, medium weight, leg warmers with welts
A stylish rib is at the top and bottom of these 22 inch long leg warmers
Flexible 91% acrylic and 9% elastic yarn maintains shape
Versatile for every day wear, exercise, dance or for uniforms.
Made in the USA

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Retro Thigh High Tube Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Retro Thigh High socks are stylish and fun as well as functional. They're great for teams, dance groups, skaters, cheerleaders or any group that wants a graphic and bold look for their uniform.
These socks have stripes at the top. They are 33 inches long, and made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic. They are very stretchy, but hold their shape once pulled on.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Retro Thigh High tube socks with three stripes at the top
33 inches in length when unstretched
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon, and 6% elastic
Fits shoe sizes 5 and up (sock sizes 11-13)
May not come up as far up on large legs

DescriptionData.Title: AJs 23" Striped Leg Warmers w/ Welt
DescriptionData.Description:
These striped leg warmers are perfect for teams or any dance group that needs an easy uniform accessory. They are also a nice fashion statement for anyone, and will keep you warm. They are stretchy enough to cover blue jeans, but have enough elastic in them to keep them in place.
These fun striped leg warmers have a stylish rib at the top and at the bottom and are made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic. Sized to fit most adults (22 inches in length)
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Leg Warmers, striped w/Welt
Sized to fit most adults (22 inches in length)
Flexible fabric that maintains shape
Made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic
Made in the USA

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Retro Knee High Tube Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Retro knee high tube socks are stylish and fun as well as functional. They're great for teams, dance groups, skaters, cheerleaders or any group that wants a graphic and bold look for their uniform.
These socks have three stripes at the top. They are 22 inches long, and made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic. They are very stretchy, but hold their shape once pulled on. Note that on large legs, these socks may not go up as far as on slender to normal legs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Knee-high vintage skater socks with three stripes at the top
22 inches in length when unstretched
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon, and 6% elastic
Fits shoe sizes 5 and up (sock sizes 11-13)
May not come up as far up on large legs

DescriptionData.Title: Retro Tube Socks - White w/ Hot Pink (Knee High)
DescriptionData.Description:
Retro knee high tube socks are stylish and fun as well as functional. They're great for teams, dance groups, skaters, cheerleaders or any group that wants a graphic and bold look for their uniform.
These socks have three stripes at the top. They are 22 inches long, and made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic. They are very stretchy, but hold their shape once pulled on. Note that on large legs, these socks may not go up as far as on slender to normal legs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Knee-high vintage skater socks with three stripes at the top
22 inches in length when unstretched
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon, and 6% elastic
Fits shoe sizes 5 and up (sock sizes 11-13)
May not come up as far up on large legs
